item.title: YubiKeys are vulnerable to cloning attacks thanks to newly discovered side
item.description: The YubiKey 5, the most widely used hardware token for two-factor authentication based on the FIDO standard, contains a cryptographic flaw that makes the finger-size device vulnerable to cloning when an attacker gains temporary physical access to it, researchers said Tuesday.
